cs302.project4

Class PortablePixmap

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs302.project4.PortablePixmap

  • public class PortablePixmap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class create a 2D grid that contains color information for each pixel. By default, it will generate a white canvas with given width and height.
    Author:
    rickixie

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.awt.Color[][] myColorArray 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PortablePixmap(int width, int height)
      This constructor create a default white canvas that takes in a width and height as int arguments.

      A getter that request the value of the pixmap's width

      The setPixel method will change the color of a specified pixel within a pixmap
      void writeToFile(java.lang.String sP)
      This method writeToFile convert the information of the pixmap (including canvas size and color information) and write to a image file using the PPM format.

      • writeToFile

        public void writeToFile(java.lang.String sP)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        This method writeToFile convert the information of the pixmap (including canvas size and color information) and write to a image file using the PPM format. The method will also throw a FileNotFoundException if the file cannot be opened for writing. If the input for file name is not in PPM format, the method will convert in to appropriate file name.
        Parameters:
        sP - The fileName to write
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file is read only or cannot be found
        java.io.IOException - if can't create a new ppm file
